name: Reduce visual background noises
description:
Hiding the commonly used promotion services by setting them invisible outside of the screen.
Basically ADS areas + SNS areas ( share buttons, etc... )
Not perfect visually, some titles or spacing can remain.
Consider using GreaseMonkey or AdsBlock or site-based specific rules for a better cover.
